text: Cantrell Donnell Williams Jr. (born November 8, 1999), better known by his stage name Pooh Shiest y, is an American rapper. He has collaborated with Big30, Gucci Mane and Lil Durk. He is best known for his 2020 single, "Back in Blood" (featuring Lil Durk). Pooh Shiesty released his first sales mixtape, Shiesty Season, on February 5, 2021. It went to number 3 on the US Billboard 200. His stage name was given by his late brother. It comes from his childhood nickname "Mr. Pooh". "Shiesty" refers to his lifestyle. == References == Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:21st-century American singer-songwriters Category:21st-century American rappers Category:American hip hop singers Category:American songwriters Category:Atlantic Records artists Category:Gangsta rappers Category:Rappers from Tennessee Category:Singers from Memphis, Tennessee Category:American trap musicians Category:American criminals Category:American prisoners Category:Pseudonyms
title: Pooh Shiesty
